txt.en: Collected slime from a slimy slug ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Jónar, a sinister dwarf in Thorin's Hall, has sent you on a scavenger hunt to collect ingredients for his special brew.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>

'I am a master brewer. Did you know that? I rarely have time these days, with all the Ale Association management I must do. Recruitment is of course the top priority and undermining the Inn League... not brewing or tasting ales.

'But I have a mind to brew something today. I wish to make a drink -- a special brew. I would like it delivered to my good friends in the Shire. I would like it to spoil their festival. I would like to ruin their day. I would like it to make them ill.

'My special brew is a secret, and I will let you in on its recipe by having you collect the ingredients for me. Be a good recruit, [placeholder], and help me with my plan.'

Jónar's ingredients can be collected in the following places: swamp-gas can be found in the Rushock Bog. Raw egg can be found at Sandson's farm. Slimy slug-slime can be found along the river's edge near Celondim.\n\nYou should collect swamp-gas, raw egg, and slug-slime for Jónar's special brew.
'Bawk!'\n\nBillina does not like your sinister look. In her alarm, she lays a disgusting rotten egg. That was easy!
Jónar is in the cellar of Thorin's Hall.\n\nYou should bring Jónar all of the disgusting ingredients you collected during your adventure.
'I don't see those ingredients I asked for. Do you think I have them? If I had them, would I ask you for them? Tell me. No, do tell me. No? Exactly. Now kindly go do as I asked.'
Collect a raw rotten egg from Sandson's Farm
Collect slime from slimy slugs near Celondim ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Bring the disgusting ingredients to Jónar
